name: India
interestingFact: India is home to the world's largest film industry, Bollywood.

name: China
interestingFact: China has the world's longest wall, the Great Wall of China, which stretches over 4,000 miles.

name: United States
interestingFact: The United States is home to the world's largest ball of twine, located in Cawker City, Kansas.

name: Indonesia
interestingFact: Indonesia is home to over 130 active volcanoes, including Krakatoa, which erupted in 1883 and was heard over 3,000 miles away.

name: Pakistan
interestingFact: Pakistan is home to the ancient Indus Valley Civilization, which dates back to 3300 BCE.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon rainforest, which produces over 20% of the world's oxygen.

name: Nigeria
interestingFact: Nigeria is home to over 250 ethnic groups, making it one of the most culturally diverse countries in the world.

name: Bangladesh
interestingFact: Bangladesh is home to the Sundarbans, the largest mangrove forest in the world.

name: Russia
interestingFact: Russia spans across 11 time zones, making it the country with the most time zones in the world.

name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan has a vending machine culture, with over 5.5 million vending machines across the country.
